name: Cozy Snowy Afternoon
description:
Connect with nature by taking cute animal photos from your bedroom while you wait for your mum to call for a nice hot chocolate.

This game was made for the Cozy Winter Game Jam. The themes were winter and connections. Honestly really ran out of time but it was fun :P

Instructions:

Use your mouse to play, click on the interactuable objects. With your camera move around with the mouse and take a photo with left click.

There is a downloadable desktop windows version available to play in case you can't play on browser.

Have fun!!

Credits:

-Art, game design and coding done by Cindy Espíndola 

-Font: Wintertime by 3rieart from dafont.com

-Sounds:

"Camera Shutter, Fast, A.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org

"Click.m4a" by SplatFreeSound  of Freesound.org

"lofi loop 5" by deleted_user_11009121 of Freesound.org

"Fire Burning Loop" by midimagician) of Freesound.org

Side note: I will continue to work on this game after the jam is over to add more things and also polish and complete already existing things so if you like it keep an eye open for that :)
